name: Not Enough Light
description:
Are you afraid of the dark? Or would you challenge it?

Master your abilities and take your own decisions. See what destiny has planned for you! But...can you control all you are capable of?

Wealth State

--- Conjure Cubes by drawing squares

--- Dash through the air by drawing arrows in respective directions

Power State

--- Manipulate orbital spheres to annihilate your opponents

Wisdom State

--- True sight enables you to see what normal eyes cannot

--- Reign down chaos calling a shower of stars

Features
  1. Three different endings, based on your choices throughout the story
  2. Frustrating, challenging, yet rewarding game play 
  3.  Three progression systems that personalize mechanics based on your choices
  4.  Plenty of animations, sound effects and voice lines that will trigger curiosity and addiction
  5.  Easter eggs, find them ;)
